mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user ( email, user_name, password, register_time, last_login_time, user_type, prefer_language, accepted, submitted, bio, send_code ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{registerTime}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{userType}, #{preferLanguage}, #{accepted}, #{submitted}, #{bio}, #{sendCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user SET email = #{email}, user_name = #{userName}, password = #{password}, register_time = #{registerTime}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, user_type = #{userType}, prefer_language = #{preferLanguage}, accepted = #{accepted}, submitted = #{submitted}, bio = #{bio}, send_code = #{sendCode} WHERE user_id = #{userID}
mapper.select: SELECT count(user_id) > 0 AS result FROM t_user WHERE email=#{email}
SELECT count(user_id) > 0 AS result FROM t_user WHERE user_name=#{userName}
SELECT count(user_id) > 0 AS result FROM t_user WHERE user_name=#{userName} AND password=#{password};
SELECT count(user_id) > 0 AS result FROM t_user WHERE user_name=#{email} AND password=#{password};
SELECT * FROM t_user ORDER BY `accepted` DESC, `accepted`/`submitted` DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{count}
